replies.body:
Well Atlas is coming in with a new hub...
Why fix something that they would have to I'd assume contact Funky to upload to the map to the hubs, and then have the server reset when a new hub is around the corner in Atlas.
And from what Staff that are high up or may even be helping create the update that they are saying there is a high possibility in August.

You don't come for the hub, you come for the game. If it were a permanent hub for a long time, then yes, fix it, but the hub will be removed in a bit.
